Title: Dave Ramsey Takes Live Questions From EntreLeadership Summit
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about:

•      How to retain big talent without big money

•      How A.I. can screw up your company

•      Dave Ramsey’s method for screening potential hires

•      A business owner who is scared of releasing control of her business
